(a[i] - '0') : 0; ++i;\n            jval = (j < b.length()) ? (b[j] - '0') : 0; ++j;\n            s.push_back(((carry + ival + jval) % 10) + '0');\n            carry = (carry + ival + jval)/10;\n        }\n        reverse(s.begin(), s.end());\n        return s;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-strings"}
